headline: Best moves for your portfolio: Buy Ulta Beauty, avoid Arista
summary: Zacks Investment Management senior client portfolio manager Brian Mulberry joins Asking for a Trend host Josh Lipton on Good Buy or Goodbye to explain why he is bullish on Ulta Beauty (ULTA) and bearish on Arista Networks (ANET). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.
